We're just 70 days out from the most fateful election of our lifetime. This one offers a choice between two radically different visions for America: It's either freedom and opportunity for all or the radical left and socialism. I believe the people will vote with freedom!
His record is crystal clear. @realDonaldTrump is the President of opportunity.
Proposed a $4 trillion tax plan that raises taxes on 82% of Americans specifically small businesses and the middle class (cont.)
